interpretation:
The Mending Heart card is a reminder that sometimes we need to take a step back and take care of ourselves. This card indicates that you may have recently gone through a difficult period, but it is time to start healing and moving forward. It is a symbol of hope and renewal.

The Mending Heart encourages you to seek out ways to take care of yourself, whether that is through therapy, self-care, or spending time with loved ones who support you. This card also represents the idea that wounds can heal, and that sometimes the process of healing can make us stronger.

If you draw the Mending Heart card, it is a sign that you are on the path to recovery and that you should continue to take care of yourself and work towards healing. This card reminds you that you are not alone and that there are people who care about you.

Overall, the Mending Heart card is a positive and hopeful card that encourages you to take care of yourself and focus on your own well-being.
